title: Website Uptime Checker
description: Monitors website availability and sends automated email alerts when a site is down. Perfect for QA testers and developers.

title: Weather + AQI Dashboard
description: Responsive dashboard displaying real-time weather data and air quality index with charts and light/dark mode toggle.

title: Bug Tracking System
description: Full-stack Java web application for QA bug reporting and tracking with user management, dashboard, and export features.

title: Leave Management System
description: Enterprise-grade web application for managing employee leave requests with approval workflows and admin controls.
